name: Eukaryon
description:
The world is dangerous when you're alone!

You're just a tiny cell – but team up with your friends and you'll defeat every intruder! Swim through a world of microscopic wonders and woes, collect the right antibodies to prepare for every kind of foe and form a massive blob to stay safe together!

Instructions in gameplay video!

A Game by Kira Wanjek, Vincenzo Angrisano, Gerrit Grieger and Maria Weninger
